You gaze in awe at the enormous elephants. At your current size, you are just about insignificant to them. Though there are a few calves that are rather small, the adults loom above like enormous buildings. You are far enough away from any of them that they do not seem to notice you, though.

The shadow that suddenly falls over you makes you realize otherwise, though.

Spinning around, you see an adult female elephant standing over you and looking right at you. Her trunk slowly waves back and forth as she stares you down. She seems somewhat smaller than the other adults (although she is still gigantic to you), and she is very intimidating considering the immense size difference. You're only an inch, maybe a few inches tall tops.

You can't run or hide. So you just stand still and wait for this elephant to make her move.

And she does. She crouches slightly as her trunk reaches out, the grey-skinned appendage looping around your body and suddenly tightening around you, coiling around you. Your entire body from the shoulders down is surrounded by the elephant's trunk, and your arms are even pinned. Though you don't want to agitate the giant creature, you nonetheless squirm a bit, as her grip is very strong and not very comfortable.

She doesn't even react, though, and simply raises you way up into the air, making you dizzy with the fast motions, until you are brought to a sudden stop before her gigantic face. Her eyes, each the size of your whole body, take you in, and you stop struggling to just stare back. You're amazed at the size of this animal.

The elephant only stares at you for a little bit, though, before a high pitched trumpet rings out from behind her. Slowly, she turns, keeping her trunk wrapped tightly around you, and you can see a young elephant calf standing behind the adult. It trumpets again, and the elephant holding you lets out a very quiet trumpet (though loud enough to hurt your ears) in response. She then lowers you back down to the ground and releases you, and you suddenly realize that she is giving you to this calf. As a toy, perhaps? Or maybe... A pet?

Feet on the ground again, you look up at the calf, realizing by a quick glance at its underside that it is female too. She is less than half the size of the adult, but still enormous to you. You fear what she might do, considering your total inability to fight her, and quickly realize at she is of a similar mindset to the adult as her trunk reaches down to you. Thinking fast this time, you raise your arms to avoid them being pinned, and allow the appendage to coil around you. It's smaller than the adult's and only covers your torso and waist in one loop, but still plenty big enough to get a good grip and lift you off the ground. You're raised up to the calf's face, and she gazes at you with wide eyes, giving off quiet yet high pitched noises that sound like they convey excitement.

You can't help but smile. This calf is cute despite her enormous size, and the joy she has at holding you is endearing. To your surprise, she doesn't squeeze you or hurt you at all--her trunk's grasp is firm, yet gentle enough to not hurt. Plus, the fact that your arms are not pinned this time actually makes you start to enjoy the feeling of being held.

The calf stares at you for a bit longer, then begins to walk, lowering you from in front of her face but now holding you in front of her, her trunk extended out a ways. You feel a bit nervous being held so far away from the calf, since you're surrounded by open air, but her grasp on you is tight enough that you feel safe from falling. You start to enjoy the rude, and even let the elephant calf's trunk as she carries you. Being tiny may be dangerous... But at least for now, there is a friendly giant animal whose grasp you can feel safe in.
